briefTitle: A Multi-Center Open-Label Evaluation of the Safety of Sarecycline Tablets in the Treatment of Acne Vulgaris
officialTitle: A Multi-Center Open-Label Evaluation of the Safety of Sarecycline Tablets in the Treatment of Acne Vulgaris
summary: Open-label study will evaluate the safety of an approximate 1.5 mg/kg/day dose of oral sarecycline in the long-term treatment of participants with moderate to severe facial acne vulgaris.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With at Least 1 Treatment-Emergent Adverse Event (TEAE)
